function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Transmission of droplets of different sizes over long distances","Impact":"Increased risk of long-range transmission of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Promotion of indoor ventilation and filtration systems to reduce the concentration of airborne droplets","Technologies":"Air purifiers, HEPA filters, UV germicidal irradiation","People":"Public, healthcare workers, indoor occupants","Owner":"Building managers, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Inaccurate assessment of transmission distance due to evaporation effects","Impact":"Underestimation of the reach of smaller droplets and their potential transmission distances","Mitigation":"Incorporation of evaporation effects in the calculation of transmission distance","Technologies":"Computational fluid dynamics (CFD) modeling, evaporation modeling software","People":"Researchers, public health authorities","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Focus on larger droplets and neglect of smaller droplets","Impact":"Incomplete understanding of transmission risks associated with smaller droplets and their evaporation effects","Mitigation":"Inclusion of research studies on the behavior and transmission of smaller droplets","Technologies":"Particle size analyzers, high-speed imaging systems","People":"Scientists, researchers, public health authorities","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"}]}
